name: Untitled Daki Game
description:
Disclaimer: This is the very first game I ever released so sorry if it's not that high quality.Originally, this was supposed to be an entry for GMTK's 2022 Game Jam. However, I couldn't get mine submitted on time. So I've spent the past few months trying to get it in a somewhat working condition. 

Untitled Daki Game is a survival beat 'em up in which you have to survive against Daki's evil selves for as long as possible. Even though Keyboard and Mouse is supported, it is HIGHLY recommended to play with a controller. You also have a special ability that activates a random effect.
